column4: hey guys i have ubuntu 5.04 and i see that my gnome enviroment does not look like 6.10 or 6.04 how can i update that?
by far the shortest route will be to install 6.10
there are too many upgrades to do to achieve what you want and it is very doubtful imho that you would in any case be pleased with the result ..... backup your /home directory and install 6.10
